mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_members (member_token, name, phone, password, nickname, status, created_at) VALUES (#{memberToken}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{status}, #{createdAt});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_members WHERE (phone = #{loginId} OR nickname = #{loginId}) AND password = #{loginPw}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reserve (member_token, shop_token, reserve_at, personnel, reserve_menu, visit, message) VALUES (#{memberToken}, #{shopToken}, #{reserveAt}, #{personnel}, #{reserveMenu}, #{visit}, #{message});
mapper.select: SELECT sum(personnel) FROM tbl_reserve WHERE shop_token = #{shopToken} AND reserve_at = #{reserveAt} GROUP BY reserve_at
